(Simplified: 挝)
Pictophonetic: 過 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
  • Chinese Definition:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 過 [ guò ] pass; to go across, to pass through
①打，敲打：鞭撾。撾鼓。撾殺。
②古同“抓”，用指或爪撓。
(Simplified: 挝)
Pictophonetic: 過 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
  • Chinese Definition:
Hanzi: 挝

撾字的基本解释

撾
zhuā

撾
wō
均见“挝”。

撾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuā］
［《集韻》張瓜切，平麻，知。］
“挝1”的繁体字。
(1)击，敲打。
(2)鼓槌。
(3)指击鼓的音节。
(4)兵器名。
(5)髀，大腿。
(6)抓。
[②]［wō］
“挝2”的繁体字。
老挝。亚洲国名。

撾字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　撾； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页457第23
【集韻】【韻會】?張瓜切，音檛。擊也。【魏志·太祖紀】伯魚三娶孤女，謂之撾婦翁。【唐書·柳宗元傳】自古賢人才士被謗議，不能自明，故有無兄盜嫂，娶孤女撾婦翁者。　又擊鼓也。【後漢·禰衡傳】曹操召爲鼓吏，衡方爲漁陽參撾，聲節悲壯。　又【字彙補】古禾切，音戈。【蘇軾·守歲詩】晨雞且勿唱，更鼓畏添撾。明年豈無年，心事恐蹉跎。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [zhuā]
["Jiyun" Zhang Guaqie, Pingma, Zhi. ]
The traditional characters of "Laos 1".
(1) Hit, beat.
(2) Drumsticks.
(3) Refers to the syllable of drumming.
(4) The name of the weapon.
(5) Thigh, thigh.
(6) Catch.
[②]［wō］
The traditional characters of "Laos 2".
Laos. Asian country names.
Os
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　os; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 457 23
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Zhang Guaqie, sound song. Hit also. [Wei Zhi·Tai Zu Ji] Bo Yu married an orphan in the third, which is called a woman of the Osmanthus. [Tang Shu·Liu Zongyuan Biography] Since ancient times, wise men and talents have been slandered and cannot be self-evident. Therefore, there are people who have robbed orphans and married orphans.　Drumming again. [Later Han·Ni Heng Biography] Cao Cao was called as a drumman, Heng Fang was Yuyang and Sanos, with a tragic sound.　[Word Supplement] Gu Heqie, Yin Ge. 【Su Shi·Shou Year Poems】Don't sing the chicken in the morning, and even more fear to add to the country. Will there be no year next year, and my mind will be lost.
